casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alfred William RILEY, Jr. No. 618P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Alfred Wm. Riley, Jr., for Riley. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of May 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
